title: Terror at Louvre in Paris after 'soldier shoots man who attempted to enter museum with suitcase'
text:
Terror at Louvre in Paris after 'soldier shoots man who attempted to enter museum with suitcase' Officials have described it as a "serious security incident" and evacuated the gallery and nearby shopping centre Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Terror in Paris: First footage from scene at Louvre Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Armed police have been called to the world famous Louvre art gallery this morning. 
A heavy police presence can be seen in Paris with the gallery and nearby shopping centre all evacuated. 
It has been reported that a soldier had opened fire after being assaulted. 
The soldier reportedly opened fire after a man tried to enter the museum with a suitcase. 
A heavy police presence is now in the area with heavily armed police guarding the site. Louvre attack (Photo: @voiceb0xx/Twitter) 
Officials have described it as a serious security incident.
